SYNCOR INTERNATIONAL CORP., Woodland Hills, Calif., the No. 1 distributor and manufacturer of nuclear medicine for hospitals and clinics, said a subsidiary, Comprehensive Medical Imaging Inc., had agreed to buy 14 medical imaging centers from US Diagnostic Inc., West Palm Beach, Fla., for about $41 million in cash and debt.
